    • Class JWordle.MainPage

      class MainPage extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • b
          ButtonOperator b
          Responds to MouseClick button events.
        • jbArray
          JButton[] jbArray
          Store all the buttons in main page.

          Although there is only one button in the main page, but it is necessary to make my code scalability

        • k
          KeyboardReader k
          Respond to Keyboard input events.
        • letterBoxes
          LetterBoxes letterBoxes
          An LetterBoxes instance displayed in the main page.
        • titleLabel
          JLabel titleLabel
          The first text line containing "Wordle".
        • version
          JLabel version
          The text line in the button indicating the version.
        • wordList
          WordList wordList
          An instance of WordList, the wordlist in use.

    • Class JWordle.PopWindow

      class PopWindow extends JDialog implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • jb

          mainly used for adding an MouseListener outside the class
